author.persName: Tiflīsī, Ḥubaysh ibn Ibrāhīm, d. ca. 1203

التفليسى، حبيش ابن ابراهيم بن محمد
ابو الفضل

msItem.title: Kāmil al-taʻbīr
كامل التعبير
msItem.note: Incomplete, the text ending abruptly in the entry on 'murdan'. F1a: a) Signature of David Price, dated 1800. b) Note recording presentation of the book by Hakim al-Mamalik Masih al-Dawlah Masih-i Zaman Khan Bahadur to an inferior, the nearby impression of whose seal has been obliterated. Headings and punctuation in red. A work on the interpretation of dreams. In sixteen chapters, chapter 16, a mostly alphabetical list of things that might be seen in dreams with their significance, occupies most of the book. Dedicated to the Sultan of Rum, 'Izz al-din Qilij Arslan (551-88/1156-92).
msItem.incipit: Sipas mar Khuday-ra ki u samad u qadir ast

listBibl.bibl: Ethe, No 2276. Cf. Rieu, ii, p. 852.
Price's bequest is noted in the Journal for 1836, pp. xii-xiv (an obituary notice p. lx).

bindingDesc.p: Indian red leather binding with coloured stamped cartouches and borders. Back cover detached.

availability.p: Visitors are welcome to consult manuscripts in the library by prior appointment. Information on access is available on the library page of the Society's web site at www.royalasiaticsociety.org and appointments can be arranged by e-mailing library@royalasiaticsociety.org
